mapper.select: SELECT amc.id , MenuId , ParId , MenuName , IFNULL(Url, '') AS Url , amc.isButton , amc.isLock , AuthCode FROM menuinfo amc JOIN roleauth aam ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id JOIN accountinfo kb ON kb.roleid = aam.RoleId JOIN roleinfo ro ON ro.id = kb.roleid WHERE kb.id = #{accountId} AND ro.isLock = 0 AND amc.isLock = 0 AND kb.islock = 0 UNION ALL SELECT amc.id , MenuId , ParId , MenuName , IfNULL(Url, '') AS Url , amc.IsButton , amc.isLock , AuthCode FROM menuinfo amc JOIN accountauth aam ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id JOIN accountinfo kb ON kb.id = aam.id WHERE 0>=kb.RoleId AND kb.id = #{accountId} AND kb.isLock = 0 AND amc.isLock = 0
SELECT * , -1 AS accoutid FROM menuinfo a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.MenuId FROM accountauth b WHERE b.AccoutId = #{userID} ) t ON a.Id = t.MenuId where a.isLock = 0
SELECT *,-1 as accoutid FROM menuinfo a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.MenuId FROM roleauth b WHERE b.roleid = #{roleID} ) t ON a.Id = t.MenuId where a.isLock = 0
SELECT Id,ParId,MenuName,isLock,Url,IsButton, AuthCode FROM menuinfo where ParId=#{parId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and isLock = 0

SELECT amc.Id , amc.ParId , amc.MenuName , amc.isLock , amc.Url , amc.IsButton , amc.AuthCode,IFNULL(amc2.MenuName,'一级菜单') AS ParMenuName, CASE WHEN amc.ParId=0 THEN 1 WHEN amc.ParId!=0 AND amc.IsButton =0 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS Jibie FROM menuinfo AS amc LEFT JOIN menuinfo AS amc2 ON amc.ParId=amc2.id WHERE amc.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
